Compatible with iOS 10

Compatible with Noctis & ColorBanners!

Modern brings a new style to your notifications & widgets!

Options:
Enable or disable Modern for widgets or banners separately
Use big icons or the default size
Enable beautiful shadows for the icon and labels
Use white or black text color in the headers
Remove or customize the "No Notifications" label to your liking!

Configure in settings
